archimate:TechnologyFunction.name: Technology Function
archimate:TechnologyFunction.documentation:
Archimate 3: http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap10.html#_Toc371413420 A technology function represents a collection of technology behavior that can be performed by a node.
Smileham: An internal function of the system, e.g. Transcode, Copy, Format
